name: Push-up
description: A classic upper body exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Running
description: An excellent cardiovascular exercise that improves endurance and burns calories.

name: Squats
description: Targets the muscles in the legs, particularly the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Plank
description: Strengthens the core muscles, including the abs, back, and shoulders.

name: Cycling
description: A low-impact aerobic exercise that improves cardiovascular health and leg strength.

name: Lunges
description: Works the muscles in the legs and buttocks, helping to improve balance and stability.

name: Yoga
description: A practice that combines physical postures, breath control, and meditation to enhance flexibility and mindfulness.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A simple and effective full-body exercise that boosts heart rate and improves coordination.
